tool_description: Processes customer appeals for account suspensions with automated review and decision recommendations.

appeal_id.description: Unique identifier for the appeal case

account_id.description: Account identifier for the suspended account

supporting_evidence.description: List of evidence identifiers or descriptions submitted by customer

original_violation_type.description: Type of violation that led to suspension

review_priority.description: Appeal review priority: low, normal, high, expedited

auto_decision_enabled.description: Whether to enable automated decision making for clear cases

reviewer_notes.description: Additional notes from manual reviewer if applicable

error_messages: Appeal not found: The specified appeal_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid appeal status: Appeal has already been processed or is not in reviewable state.
Missing appeal content: appeal_text cannot be empty for processing.
Unknown violation type: original_violation_type must match a valid violation category.
Processing timeout: Appeal processing took too long due to complexity. Manual review may be required.
usage: Provide appeal_id, account_id, appeal_text, and original_violation_type; optionally include supporting_evidence array and set review_priority for urgent cases.

processing_status.description: Processing result: approved, denied, requires_manual_review, incomplete

recommended_action.description: Recommended action: reactivate, maintain_suspension, reduce_suspension, conditional_reactivation

next_steps.description: Required follow-up actions based on decision
